title: Limited health literacy is a major barrier to heart disease prevention and treatment

title_detail.value: Limited health literacy is a major barrier to heart disease prevention and treatment

summary: Limited health literacy is a major barrier to heart health and managing heart disease and stroke. Health literacy is essential to navigate the health care system, use medication effectively and improve heart-healthy behaviors.

summary_detail.value: Limited health literacy is a major barrier to heart health and managing heart disease and stroke. Health literacy is essential to navigate the health care system, use medication effectively and improve heart-healthy behaviors.
